拞字的基本解释

拞
dǐ
古同“抵”。

拞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dǐ］
［《廣韻》都禮切，上薺，端。］
亦作“拞1”。亦作“掋1”。
(1)排挤；诋毁。
(2)抵赖；谎骗。
(3)抵挡；抗拒。
(4)抵消；抵偿。
(5)抵押。
(6)谓处以与其罪行相当的惩罚。
(7)值；相当；比。
(8)碰触；触犯。
(9)指抵触。
(10)撑；顶。
(11)至；到达。
(12)遇到。
(13)干谒；归依。
(14)书法的执笔方法之一。以小指靠着托住无名指，挡住和推着中指的钩。
(15)犹底。如何，什么。
(16)同“柢”。本。本金，原价。
(17)同“柢”。本。犹根。本根。
[②]［zhǐ］
［《集韻》掌氏切，上紙，章。］
亦作“拞2”。
(1)侧击；击。
(2)弃掷；投掷。

拞字的康熙字典解释

【備考】【卯集】【手字部】　拞； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页427第16
【龍龕】同抵。

拞字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
拞字的起名意思

暂无。

Fang
Basic explanation of words
Fang
dǐ
Gu Tong "arrived."
Fang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dǐ］
["Guangyun" is courteous, cut, top, and side. ]
Also known as "Fang 1". Also known as "carry 1".
(1) Squeeze out; slander.
(2) Denial; lie.
(3) Resist; resist.
(4) Offset; Compensation.
(5) Mortgage.
(6) It means that the punishment is commensurate with the crime.
(7) Value; equivalent; ratio.
(8) Touch; offend.
(9) Refers to conflict.
(10) Support; top.
(11) To; arrive.
(12) Encountered.
(13) Dry Ye; Return.
(14) One of the writing methods of calligraphy. Hold the ring finger with the little finger, block and push the hook of the middle finger.
(15) Judith. How, what.
(16) Same as "柢". this. Principal, original price.
(17) Same as "柢". this. Jugen. This root.
[②]［zhǐ］
["Ji Yun" Zhang Shi cut, put on paper, chapter. ]
Also known as "Fang 2".
(1) Side strike; hit.
(2) Throw; throw.
Fang
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Remarks] [Mao Ji] [Hands and Words Department] 　拞; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 427 to 16
[Long Niche] Arrive at the same time.
Fang

Fang
